author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-407 Use the current working directory as the parent for the repository
folder if sling.home is not set (previous fix did not really work)

author: jsdelfino
msg: Clean up list of targets after bindings have been created for all of them as having both is not correct and also confuses the connectComponentReferences algorithm. Make sure that optimizable bindings (like the SCA binding) configured with binding URIs are properly set up with pointers to their target component services.
